We will need a fully functioning child care system when this pandemic is over and our economy gets back on track. Read more below. (3/3) https://t.co/tlx8Z0ToJY

The process began over the weekend & is focused on: 

1) Protecting the health of children, families & child care workers. 
2) Providing child care for essential worker households.
3) Sustaining the child care sector as an industry that’s essential to every business in ND. (2/3)
We've launched a rapid planning process to develop operating guidelines to ensure that child care is available for health care and other essential workers through the COVID-19 crisis. (1/3)

A recent viral post claims that the President would enact a mandatory nationwide quarantine. When asked about this in his press conference today, the President said, “We are working with the Governors and I don’t think we’ll ever find that necessary.”

During a crisis, misinformation is often our greatest enemy. New information regarding COVID-19 remains dynamic and constantly changing. Given the importance and fluidity of this situation it is vital that we circulate only factual reports and refrain from rumor.
